articles.headline: 49ers rule out Brock Purdy, Ricky Pearsall for Texans game
articles.description: With starter Brock Purdy slowly working his way back from the right big toe injury that's kept him out since Week 4, the 49ers will again turn to backup Mac Jones on Sunday against the Texans. Ricky Pearsall also is out.
